QuestData.Title: Aviana's Request
QuestData.Description: The arakkoa are creatures of the sky, and are thus within the domain of the great Aviana.$B$BI have been sent to procure a feather, that we may parley with them through the language of the winds. We will extend an invitation of peace, and a place on the Great Bough.$B$BWould you aid us in this quest? The feather must come from an arakkoan of nobility. You will find them in the place known as Skyreach.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect some Pristine Plumage in Skyreach.
